main.name: Mounika Ravi Hospet
main.description: I am a developer  proficient in Java, Python, Angular and SQL
main.bio: Software, Web and Database development enthusiast. I have an experience of 2 years as an Angular Developer and front-end development is my forte. I have also been learning React to expand my skillet in the front-end frameworks. Though I am not as experienced in database development, working with it fascinates me.
main.contactmessage: Please enter your message and details below to get in touch with me.

education.description: Fundamentals of Data Science, Database Systems and Advanced Computer Architecture are the courses that I am currently enrolled in.

education.school: Sreenidhi Institute of Science and Technology, India
education.description: This is when I developed interest in Web Technologies and Database Systems. I have a CGPA of 8.32 during my Bachelors.

work.title: Graduate Teaching Assistant
work.description: My work includes supervising undergraduate students and helping them with their queries in Software Engineering, grading the assignments and projects of the students in the SE class, conducting code interviews of their projects and taking mock interviews.

work.title: Angular Developer
work.description: Lead Angular developer for 3 applications built as a part of the Infosys Health Platform, that deals with US based insurance companies. Worked on demo versions of the various applications that was showcased to the clients, which were successfully approved by the clients for production. Setting up CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins. Worked for solutions development for Supply Chain Control Tower dashboard using ‘Grafana’.

work.title: Intern
work.description: During the internship I was first trained in Python (fundamentals and OOPS), RDBMS, JAVA, Angular 4 and Spring Boot. Then, worked on a full stack Angular project (Created a Blogging Application).

work.title: Intern
work.description: Worked for a Singapore based NGO to develop a website for its branch in India, where I was a Front-end developer

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels

projects.title: Fury Fighting Gear
projects.category: (offline now) A fighting gear company I started

projects.title: Resume Website

projects.title: Smirkspace
projects.category: (MVP Only) A React and Meteor based chat University project.

testimonials.text: You do a great job organizing the team and the project. Could not have done the project without you. You were like a pillar to the project

Your support and encouragement during the difficult and the good times were inseparable.  It has been a pleasure to work with you. The knowledge that you shared with us and the learning you brought cannot be compared with anything. Thank you so much for your support at all times.
